notesStmt.note: Damp at all edges. All folios individually guarded before rebinding, with lots of repairs/infills at edges. Stained. Many leaves missing.
Folios 2r-11r contain imperfect alphabetical indexes of the pieces included in the manuscript.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.
